base.description: base font size value for rem
sets the base value for size

display01.description: Used for extra large brand or marketing aligned messaging. Commonly found on landing pages and not used within B2B product.

display02.description: Used for large brand or marketing aligned messaging. Commonly found on landing pages and not used within B2B product.

title01.description: Used for large layout and page titles with no more than 3-4 words or where a line break does not occure.

title02.description: Used for medium to small layout or section titles.

title03.description: Used for small headings and subsection headings. commonly found in modals.

title04.description: Used for small headings typicaly no longer than one word in tables and cards.

title05.description: Used for small headings typicaly no longer than one word in tables and cards.

title06.description: Used for subheadings typicaly no longer than one word.

paragraph01.description: Used for body copy with no more than 2 lines. Commonly used for marketing or brand orientated messaging.

paragraph02.description: Used for body copy with no more than 4 lines. Commonly used for marketing or brand orientated messaging.

paragraph03.description: Used for body copy with no more than 4 lines. Commonly used for marketing or brand orientated messaging.

paragraph04.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

eyebrows01.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

label01.description: Used for most components as the first and second level of information hirearchy.

label02.description: Used for most components as the first and second level of information hirearchy.

label03.description: commonly used for secondary levels of information within components.

label04.description: commonly used to add emphasis within components with tabular layouts. Commonly used in input fields.

helper01.description: Used for Helper text, tooltips and inline validation for user input components.

badge01.description: Used for Helper text, tooltips and inline validation for user input components.

composition.description: Composition token for button large uses @Depreacted font styles
Composition token for button medium @Depreacted font styles
Composition token for button small uses @Depreacted font styles
